name: destroy-dev-env
description: This is an example application that shows good practices for development environments.

scripts.install-all: npm i && concurrently "npm -C api i" "npm -C ui i" "npm -C mocks i"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm -C api start" "npm -C ui start" "npm -C mocks start"
scripts.reset: ./scripts/check-configs.sh && docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d && npm run install-all && npm start
